title: Hypnotic (upcoming film)
text:
Hypnotic is an upcoming American <a href="science%20fiction%20film">sci-fi</a> <a href="action%20film">action thriller</a> directed by <a href="Robert%20Rodriguez">Robert Rodriguez</a>, written by <a href="Max%20Borenstein">Max Borenstein</a> and Rodriguez and it features an <a href="ensemble%20cast">ensemble cast</a> that includes <a href="Ben%20Affleck">Ben Affleck</a>, <a href="Alice%20Braga">Alice Braga</a>, <a href="Hala%20Finley">Hala Finley</a>, <a href="Dayo%20Okeniyi">Dayo Okeniyi</a>, <a href="William%20Fichtner">William Fichtner</a> and <a href="JD%20Pardo">JD Pardo</a>.
Plot.
A detective becomes entangled in a mystery involving his missing daughter and a secret government program, while investigating a string of impossible high-end heists.
Production.
In November 2018, <a href="Robert%20Rodriguez">Robert Rodriguez</a> was confirmed to direct "Hypnotic", with <a href="Max%20Borenstein">Max Borenstein</a> writing the script for <a href="Studio%208%20%28company%29">Studio 8</a>. In November 2019, it was reported that Studio 8 would co-produce with <a href="Solstice%20Studios">Solstice Studios</a>, which was set to distribute the film in the United States.
In November 2019, <a href="Ben%20Affleck">Ben Affleck</a> was set to star in the film. In May 2021, <a href="Alice%20Braga">Alice Braga</a> was added to the cast, with filming set to begin on September 20 in <a href="Austin%2C%20Texas">Austin, Texas</a>. In September 2021, <a href="Hala%20Finley">Hala Finley</a> was added to the cast. In October 2021, it was reported <a href="Dayo%20Okeniyi">Dayo Okeniyi</a>, <a href="William%20Fichtner">William Fichtner</a> and <a href="JD%20Pardo">JD Pardo</a> had joined the cast.
<a href="Principal%20photography">Principal photography</a> began in Austin on September 27, 2021, and concluded on November 19 of the same year.
